column5: New to North Bay fishing and looking for some spots to try around the area?  Any help would be great.
There's no fish around here.  Quit while you're still ahead.
i tried kings landing today.... but no action. thts a decent shore spot later in the season.
try off sunset point, just off Lakeshore dr. behind Churchhills.  The government dock(King's landing) is also decent.
x2. Would be exactly where I would tell you to go.  You can also try around the Lavase launch. You'll find pike in the river.
I will be sure to give them all a try.  Glad to hear there are some spots around North Bay.  I went to Sturgeon Falls today but nothing doing at the train bridge.
Arty, on the weekend there were guys catching 40-60 white bass at the train bridge. We caught 5 in the 2 days but day one we only had worms. Need minnows for them.
Are you guys insane?   Why would you share information with a Bills fan on an open forum?
